metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12482 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereferencein the function gf_isom_get_original_format_type at isomedia/drm_sample.cin libgpac.a, as demonstrated by MP4Box.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12482` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
